name: AJ Surf Co's - Hello World
description:
This is a very short but fun game.  I made it following a tutorial by HeartBeast on YouTube. It was my very first game venturing, away from the financial and government industries, into something a lot more fun; Video Game Programming.  I saw this one through to completion so that I could make it a habit.   The next few tutorials went well, but I wanted to hurry up to build something Earth Moving.  

The game I released for real is Aurora Realms. Just wanted to put a plug in, and claim my seat, as a Indie Video Game Developer.
